name: The Disappearance of Haruhi Suzumiya (Kyoto Animation / Kyoani) Style LoRA
description:
The Disappearance of Haruhi Suzumiya (Kyoto Animation / Kyoani) style LoRA

Making models can be expensive. Do you like what I do? Consider supporting me on Patreon 🅿️ or feel free to buy me a coffee ☕

Should work fine at around weight 1 on AnyLoRA ckpt. Use kyoani haruhi style to increase fidelity. AnyLoRA also knows the character names of the main cast, so you can also use those with my base model.

Remember this is a style LoRA. To make characters accurately you need other networks too (but it can get pretty close with accurate descriptions and character names).


How to use LoRA's in auto1111:

  • Update webui (use git pull like here or redownload it)

  • Copy the file to stable-diffusion-webui/models/lora

  • Select your LoRA like in this video

  • Make sure to change the weight (by default it's :1 which is usually too high)

meta.prompt: <lora:kyoani_haruhi_style_offset:1> kyoani haruhi style,  1girl, solo, kita high school uniform, sailor collar, school uniform, blue sailor collar, brown hair, serafuku, cardigan, brown eyes, medium hair, armband, ribbon, hairband, open mouth, open cardigan, parody, hair ribbon, orange hairband, brown cardigan, smile, open clothes, short hair, ((masterpiece))
